Literature.Title: A New Synthetic Peptide with In vitro Antibacterial Potential Against Escherichia coli O157:H7 and Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA).
Literature.Author: Prada YA, Guzmán F, Rondón P, Escobar P, Ortíz C, Sierra DA, Torres R, Mejía-Ospino E

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:26% Hemolysis=100 µM,Vero cells:50% Cell death=40.6 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=4.5±0.01µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=7.0±0.02µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=8.1±0.03µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=15±0.02µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=10.2±0.02µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=35±0.02µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=35.2±0.01µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=6.2±0.02µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=3.9±0.02µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=4.0±0.01µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=6.1±0.01µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=6.0±0.03µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=6.5±0.02µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC50=6.2±0.04µM)
